titles.title: Gird Yourself, Arise Unto The Battle

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Gird yourself, arise unto the battle,
Vested in the armor of the faith.
Fear not, the God of hosts doth go before;
This battle shall be the Lord's.
Chorus:
If our God hath delighted over us,
If He hath seen us willing day by day to serve,
If He find in us a humble and a contrite heart,
Surrendered unto Him without reserve,
Casting off the sin that did beset us,
With its bitterness, resentments, and distress,
Exalting Him above our vain ambitions,
Till our ev'ry thought His lordship doth confess.
Then, surely, God shall hear us from the heavens;
His mercy and His power shall descend,
And our Champion shall win for us the victory,
Our inheritance of promise,
Canaan land.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Fear not the giants who oppose you,
Intending to dispossess you of your hope.
For their help hath forsaken the foes of the Lord,
But our God shall fight in our midst.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Levántate, sube a la batalla
Ponte la armadura de la fe
No dudes, es Dios quien te acompaña
La victoria al final será de El.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Si Jehová se agradare de nosotros
Si no hallare en nosotros rebelión
Si encontrase un corazón humilde
Que se entrega a El sin condición
Olvidándose de todo su pasado
Amarguras, rencores y dolor
Que le ama más que a sus caminos
Y en sus vidas sólo es el Señor
Entonces El oirá desde los cielos
Su gracia y su poder descenderán
Y Jehová nos entregará la tierra
Nuestra herencia prometida Canaán

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
No temas porque hay gigantes
Queriendo arrebatarte tu heredad
Pues su amparo se apartó de ellos
Mas Dios con nosotros está.
